forumNotes.content:
> I read in the forum that must be used BCDW but I do not know how .....

WHICH Forum? ![:thumbsup:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/thumbsup.gif)  

Maybe in the 911cd one:  
[http://www.911cd.net...o...c=21360\&hl=](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=21360&hl= "External link")  
![:tabletalk:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/tabletalk.gif)  

Here you may find that grub4dos is widely used for this kind of things.  

Do browse a bit the relevant forum:  
[http://www.boot-land...hp?showforum=66](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showforum=66 "External link")  

download grub4dos, play a bit with it, search for some examples of using grldr as "no-emulation bootsector" for CD.  

Once you have the basics, booting a BartPE \\I386\\ is trivial: essentially it comes to this entry in menu.lst:  
> title BartPE  
> chainloader /I386/setupldr.bin

Parted magic may be more complex.  
Here is some info:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=4044](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/?showtopic=4044 "External link")  

there may be the need to modify some settings in it, also maybe it is possible to use the newish .iso mapping features of grub4dos:  
[http://www.boot-land...opic=3086\&st=21](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/?showtopic=3086&st=21 "External link")  

jaclaz

forumNotes.content:
Maybe Indy7 was refering to this topic here: [http://www.boot-land...?...ost\&p=31855](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?s=&showtopic=4151&view=findpost&p=31855 "External link") ------ On the second version of a project called UXP, I've mixed a XP based PE environment with a XP install CD along with Parted magic using BCDW. To use Parted Magic on your BCDW: * Extract all files from the ISO onto a folder "pmagic" on the root of the files you want to create your ISO * Add this line to your BCDW.INI --\> \\pmagic\\ISOLINUX.BIN; Parted Magic 2.0 * Specify this CD label when using mkisofs --\> "Parted Magic"
If these instructions aren't clear enough, download the beta release of the uxp 2 to see BCDW and Parted mixed together: [http://xp.winbuilder...-080326-MAR.zip](http://xp.winbuilder.net/uxp-080326-MAR.zip "External link") Also read here *(and install nlite to sucessfully run the nLite scripts)* : [http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=3651](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/?showtopic=3651 "External link") ![:thumbsup:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/thumbsup.gif)
